thread.section_title: Host Havoc Ltd. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Host Havoc Ltd. | hosthavoc.com
thread.title: Jacob Parker
thread.title_full: Host Havoc Ltd. reviewed by Jacob Parker

author: Jacob Parker
title: Jacob Parker
text:
I've been renting a 40 slot Conan Exiles server since its release day. The support services and server's performance truly has been spectacular, especially when given the poor optimization state of the game and its server aplpication. I've had to contact support on two occasions, both issues were induced by myself. Never the less, they responded within 10 minutes with a prompt resolution to my issues.
I will continue to use this provider and recommend their services to friends looking to host their own servers. Keep up the good work dudes!
